translations: 重新安排；（用机械）重新装备

sentences.sentence: But RCTV counters that it had to rejig its business model to fit lower revenues.
sentences.translation: 但RCTV反击说，停播是因为收入减少，他们被迫要重新调整其商业模式。

sentences.sentence: Mourinho was already having to rejig his side for the semi-final second-leg showdown at Anfield.
sentences.translation: 穆里尼奥在此前已经不得不为半决赛第2回合在安菲尔德的决战而调整队伍。

sentences.sentence: Mr Osborne also wants to police Banks better, hence his plans to rejig their regulators' responsibilities.
sentences.translation: 奥斯伯恩也想更好地监管银行，因此在他的计划中重新调整了监管机构的职权。
